title: Fireside With The Underboss - Two Shooters With Ski Masks In The Lawyer's Office
description: The underboss of the DeCavalcante family asks Sammy for help on a hit. Sammy agrees but finds that his target is incredibly hard to nail down. Will this guy escape The Bull?
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: The underboss of the DeCavalcante family asks Sammy for help on a hit. Sammy agrees but finds that his target is incredibly hard to nail down. Will this guy escape The Bull?
